title: Family - The Ties That Bind...And Gag!
description: A cherished family reunion sets the stage for Erma Bombeck's predictably hilarious recollections of raising a family—that is, strangers who know each other intimately, but who have nothing in common (and want to keep it that way!). Erma's conclusion: families—you can't live with them, you can't live without them... or can you?
author: Erma Bombeck
